item.title: How to turn off autoplay on your social media feeds
item.description: Here's how you can turn off autoplaying videos and GIFs on Facebook, Instagram, X, Twitter, and Threads.

item.title: Charlie Kirk Is Dead After Utah Valley University Shooting
item.description: Turning Point USA cofounder Charlie Kirk was shot at an event at Utah Valley University on Wednesday. He later died from his injuries.

item.title: While US stalls, Australia and Anduril move to put XL undersea vehicle into service
item.description: Anduril has landed a lucrative contract and is bringing its uncrewed undersea vehicle Ghost Shark to Australian waters next year.

item.title: Klarnaâ€™s IPO pops, raising $1.4B, with Sequoia as the biggest winner
item.description: Of the 34.3 million shares Klarna sold, only 5 million were sold by the company, it said. The rest were sold by existing investors.

item.title: OpenAI and Oracle reportedly ink historic cloud computing deal
item.description: OpenAI and Oracle reportedly signed a deal that includes OpenAI buying $300 billion of compute over a five-year span.
